decks.notes: This deck focuses on quickly filling up your graveyard with powerful creatures and then bringing them back onto the battlefield to overwhelm your opponent. You have ways to discard cards, mill yourself, and reanimate creatures to create a powerful board presence. With cards like Overlord of the Balemurk and Bringer of the Last Gift, you can quickly amass a threatening army of creatures that will be difficult for your opponent to deal with. The strategy revolves around efficiently utilizing your graveyard as a resource to win the game.

The main idea of this deck is to control the game by disrupting the opponent's strategy and resources while building card advantage. It focuses on using cards like Fear of Isolation, Stock Up, and Tinybones Joins Up to disrupt the opponent's hand and board state. Entity Tracker and Grim Bauble help to generate additional value, while Stormchaser's Talent provides card draw and selection. The deck also includes removal spells like Boomerang Basics and Nowhere to Run to deal with threats. Overall, the goal is to outvalue the opponent and maintain control of the game.

This deck focuses on quickly building a strong board presence with aggressive creatures and utilizing cards that can buff and protect them. By utilizing efficient creatures like Pawpatch Recruit and Ouroboroid, combined with power boosters like Tyvar, the Pummeler and Jackal, Genius Geneticist, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a steady stream of threats. The inclusion of cards like Repulsive Mutation and Nature's Rhythm provide additional ways to disrupt the opponent's strategy while maintaining tempo. The deck's mana base is optimized to ensure consistent access to its powerful creatures and spells.

The deck focuses on a fast and aggressive playstyle, aiming to overwhelm the opponent with quick and efficient creature and spell plays. Utilizing a mix of creatures with powerful abilities and direct damage spells, the deck seeks to put pressure on the opponent early and maintain it throughout the game. The mana base is focused on ensuring consistent access to both blue and red mana sources. Overall, this deck prioritizes speed and aggression to create a dominant board presence and defeat the opponent swiftly.

This deck focuses on overwhelming the opponent with a fast and aggressive strategy using a combination of creatures with disruptive abilities and spells to control the board. By maintaining pressure early on and disrupting the opponent's game plan, the deck aims to quickly close out the game before the opponent has a chance to stabilize. The key is to constantly apply pressure, disrupt their resources, and make efficient trades in order to come out ahead and secure a victory.

The primary focus of this deck is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and burn spells. The deck is packed with cheap and efficient removal spells like Shock, Burst Lightning, and Lightning Strike to control the board while creatures like Emberheart Challenger, Hired Claw, and Razorkin Needlehead deal damage quickly. The addition of powerful dragons like Nova Hellkite and efficient beaters like Zhao, the Moon Slayer provide a strong late-game threat. Rockface Village helps to accelerate mana production and provide consistent damage output. Overall, this deck aims to win the game swiftly through aggressive creature attacks and burn spells.

The deck focuses on quickly filling up the graveyard with powerful creatures and then bringing them back into play for a devastating combo. Using cards like Awaken the Honored Dead and Analyze the Pollen, the player can easily dump creatures into the graveyard while setting up for a big reanimation play. The combination of cards like Harvester of Misery, Overlord of the Balemurk, and Bringer of the Last Gift allows for a quick and powerful reanimation strategy that can overwhelm the opponent. Valgavoth, Terror Eater and Terror of the Peaks provide additional powerful threats to close out the game.

This UR Aggro deck focuses on quickly overwhelming opponents with a combination of cheap, efficient creatures and powerful burn spells. By playing aggressively and efficiently using spells like Torch the Tower and Fear of Missing Out, along with high-tempo creatures like Duelist of the Mind and Marauding Mako, the deck aims to finish the game quickly before opponents can stabilize. The deck also utilizes card draw and control spells like Winternight Stories and Quantum Riddler to maintain pressure and disrupt opponents' game plans.

This deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with aggressive creatures and impactful instant/sorcery spells. By utilizing a mix of evasive creatures and burn spells, the deck can apply pressure early on and finish the game swiftly. Multiversal Passage allows for flexibility in mana fixing, while Fear of Missing Out and Stormchaser's Talent provide card advantage and tempo advantage. The deck is all about maintaining a fast pace and leveraging the synergy between various cards to secure a quick victory.

This deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with a combination of aggressive creatures and spell cards. The key strategy is to efficiently control the board and deal direct damage to the opponent, while also maintaining card advantage through card draw and efficient removal spells. The deck aims to close out games quickly before the opponent has a chance to stabilize and mount a comeback. A mix of tempo plays, efficient removal, and card advantage engines make this deck a formidable force in aggressive matchups.

This Golgari Aggro deck focuses on building a strong board presence quickly and efficiently, using cards like Beifong's Bounty Hunters, Badgermole Cub, and Llanowar Elves to put pressure on the opponent. It also utilizes graveyard recursion with cards like Bloodghast and Dredger's Insight to maintain card advantage and keep up the aggression. Sephiroth, Fabled SOLDIER and Umbral Collar Zealot provide additional power and evasion to push through damage, while removal spells like Lively Dirge and Scavenger's Talent help control the board. Overlord of the Balemurk and Wastewood Verge provide additional threats and utility.

The main concept of this Orzhov Aggro deck is to quickly overwhelm your opponent with aggressive creatures and powerful spells. The deck focuses on utilizing cards like Deep-Cavern Bat, Shoot the Sheriff, and Demon Wall to deal damage quickly and efficiently. Additionally, the inclusion of cards like Elspeth, Storm Slayer and Preacher of the Schism provide additional support and control options. With a mix of creature removal, card draw, and powerful creatures, this deck aims to pressure the opponent and maintain control of the battlefield to secure victory.

The focus of this Dimir Control deck is to disrupt opponent's strategies through hand disruption, removal spells, and card advantage. By utilizing cards such as Spyglass Siren, Fear of Isolation, and Tragic Trajectory, the deck aims to control the board while also generating advantage through cards like Grim Bauble and Tinybones Joins Up. Kaito, Bane of Nightmares serves as a powerful threat to close out the game. The mana base is optimized to ensure consistency in casting spells while utilizing dual lands for flexibility. Overall, the deck aims to outvalue and outcontrol the opponent.

This deck focuses on aggressively attacking opponents with a combination of creatures like Spyglass Siren and Deep-Cavern Bat, supported by spells like Tragic Trajectory and Essence Scatter to control the board. The inclusion of cards like Bitter Triumph and Enduring Curiosity provide additional value and card advantage, while Cecil, Dark Knight and Kaito, Bane of Nightmares offer strong threats. The Dimir color combination allows for a blend of aggression and disruption, aiming to overwhelm opponents quickly before they can stabilize.

This Esper Aggro deck focuses on a combination of aggressive creatures and disruptive spells to overwhelm the opponent quickly. It utilizes cards like Nurturing Pixie and Sunpearl Kirin to apply pressure, while also including spells like Tragic Trajectory and Boomerang Basics to control the board and disrupt the opponent's strategy. The inclusion of cards like Tinybones Joins Up and Grim Bauble adds an additional element of discard and card advantage to further disrupt the opponent's game plan. The deck aims to win the game through a combination of damage and disruption, maintaining control of the battlefield throughout the match.

The deck focuses on controlling the game by using a variety of spells and creatures to handle threats and disrupt the opponent's strategy. It includes powerful removal spells like Lightning Helix and Essence Scatter, as well as card draw and resource manipulation cards like Stock Up and Consult the Star Charts. Creatures like Aang, Swift Savior and Wan Shi Tong, Librarian provide additional utility and ways to generate advantage. The land base is designed to support the deck's strategy and ensure consistency in casting spells.
